programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Nē! Beigas! Barbabravo vairs nav mazulis, viņš ir liels puika!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni apņēmas sarīkot izcilu šovu! Barbaliba grib uztaisīt vislabāko limonādi.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When her parents wont let her have french fries for every meal, Hazel wishes for unlimited fries. But Cosmo and Wanda fail to mention that eating so many magical fries would turn her into a potato! For help Cosmo, Wanda, and Hazel pay a visit to Mother Nature, where Hazel accidentally eats the prized "mother potato." Can she reconcile her fry fixation and get back in Mother Natures good graces, or will Hazel have to face her wrath while stuck as a potato forever? // After Hazel and Marcus watch a scary movie Cosmo and Wanda lent them, paranormal incidents happen in the Wells home. Hazel wishes Marcus had a ghost tracking show to investigate. But Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda learn the ghost is Ghost Pepper, a fairy actress whose spirit was trapped in the video tape. Fearing her capture will reveal fairies existence, Hazel must convince Marcus to have an "exorcism" as a cover to send her back to Fairy World.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel learns about the harmful effects of trash and pollution on Earth, so she wishes that people wouldnt be such trash monsters. Cosmo and Wanda summon a friendly, talking, trash eating dumpster named Danky! Together they spread the word about sustainability and caring for the earth. Then, Dale Dimmadome tricks Danky into helping him sell more products, making people even bigger trash monsters! Hazel must get Danky back and stop Dale Dimmadome in his wasteful tracks.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Papa Smurf is returning from an expedition to find rare ingredients when one of them is accidentally eaten by one of Farmers snails. A few days later, Brainy is attacked by a creature that turns him into a zombie, and soon the whole village is contaminated. Lily and Farmer have to work together to find the monster and give it the antidote that will save the village! // Gargamel strikes a deal with Rowena: he will take her to see her favorite singer in concert and she will accept to be turned into the Smurfette so that he can trick his mother, who thinks hes completely useless. But as soon as she sees her, Granny is reminded of her childhood doll and falls under her spell. Meanwhile, in the forest, the real Smurfette is rehearsing a play with Dimwitty and Poet when both Smurfettes switch places by accident: Rowena is now acting in the play for Poet and Smurfette ends up at Gargamels hovel..

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: No one wants to look after Baby Smurf! So Brainy decides that Smurfette should do it, and shes determined to do a good job and to teach him smurf-fu. But then Grouchy gets involved, and he wants to prove that hes the best babysitter in the village! So war between the two candidates is declared. They have to compete in different challenges to decide which one of them is the best babysitter. // Blossom dreams of traveling to Mars, so Handy puts his ingenuity to the test to get her there. When Lily and Storm learn about this amazing project, they decide to help their friend, even though they will miss her when shes away. But they need to make sure that Brainy doesnt find out because Papa Smurf has forbidden all trips to Mars! Will Blossom manage to take off into space and leave all of her friends behind?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Handy invents an incredible machine that can translate what animals say. He wants to help solve their problems. But Clumsy breaks the machine and needs to make sure that his friends dont find out! So he swaps places with a bear and starts talking in its place. There are misunderstandings all over the place in the village and the Smurfs think that theyre actually talking to a real bear ... who really needs their help. // Dimwitty and Clumsy cause a huge accident when their fire truck collides with Papa Smurfs laboratory. Hes fed up with their nonsense and orders them to clean everything up. In doing so, and thinking that hes doing the right thing, Dimwitty empties some of the potions into the toilet, opening a portal with other worlds! Theyre going to have a hard time finding the way back with the toilet cubicle as a ship.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: On a fairy family trip to Fairy World, Dev convinces Hazel to steal Peris wand and explore Fairy World. Cosmo, Wanda and Peri sneak into Jorgens office and use his tracker to find them. Hazel and Dev end up stuck in the Un-Wish Zone, trapped by the Un-wish Dragon. Together they must battle the dragon and find their way back to their fairies before Jorgen finds out! // When band and orchestra tryouts happen at school, Hazel finds herself stuck in the middle of a rivalry between the two. Rather than choose a side, she wishes to be good at all instruments and ends up in both. Exhausted from the double life shes living, she wishes that the band and orchestra had nothing to be rivals about. In granting the wish, Cosmo and Wanda get rid of all music on Earth. Hazel, with the help of the Nmusic Phairy (silent N), must restore music to Earth and end this rivalry once and for all!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: During a visit from Antony, Hazels wish lands them inside "Rattleconda Racers," a board game they invented. Once in the game, however, they bicker about the best way to play. Hazel wants to stick to the rules they used to play by, but Antony wants to make new ones. When the formidable Rhonda the Rattleconda takes off with Cosmo and Wanda, intending to make them her next meal, Hazel and Antony must confront the tension in their relationship to save them and escape the game! // When Hazel must give a presentation on what she wants to be when she grows up, she is excited to share her dreams of being a geologist! Wanting to wow her classmates, she wishes she could excavate an "out of this world" rock to show them. Cosmo and Wanda poof her underground to find a super special rock, and she does! But in the process, she angers a group of rock monsters and must use her knowledge of geology to win them over, get her rock back, and escape the cave!

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick spawns an adorable mini-Patrick who quickly becomes the star of the show (until he outgrows the role). // The Star family celebrates the Klopnodian holiday Swaptoberfest by swapping identities with each other.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: 10-year-old Hazel Wells has just moved to Dimmadelphia with her family and is struggling with the change. On top of that, her beloved brother, Antony, is away at his first year of college and Hazel is feeling lonely without him. When she has a rocky start at her new school and Antony has to cancel a visit, Hazel tries to run away to visit Antony.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: After Hazel makes her one-millionth wish, Cosmo and Wanda promise her one rule-free wish as a reward. But when their magic doesnt work, they take a trip to Fairy World to investigate and discover Dev has taken control. Fed up with living in Hazels shadow, hes teamed up with Irep to give control of the Big Wand to anti-fairies and now kids all over the world have the opportunity to grant wishes rule-free. Before Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda can stop Dev, he traps Cosmo and Wanda in butterfly net cages and sends Hazel back home without her fairies to help her. While in power, Dev changes Fairy World to his own image and liking, and even reveals the existence of magic to everyone on Earth. Its total chaos. With the fate of Fairy World on her shoulders, Hazel enlists the help of Jasmine, Winn, Antony, and a few magical friends from past wishes, to rise up against Dev and his anti-fairy forces. Hazel must save Cosmo, Wanda, Peri, and Fairy World, before making a very special rule-free wish.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Winn, and Jasmine go to Patty Possums Party Playground, an entertainment fun zone for kids. Hazel wishes the animatronic Patty Possum would come to life. Patty joins the friends for the night and even brings them up to perform on stage! But at closing time, Patty doesnt want to lose her new friends, so she locks them inside the Party Playground. Cosmo and Wandas wands are stuck in the claw machine, so they cant help! They will have to evade this unhinged mascot without magic and find a way out. // Wanting Angela and Marcus to have a romantic anniversary, Hazel wishes that they would "fall in love all over again." When the wish causes her parents to forget each other, Hazel calls on Cupid to make them fall back in love. Upset that Hazel undid his work, Cupid challenges her to a competition in which Hazel and Marcus must compete with Cupid and Angelas old flame, Brewster, for Angelas affection. Can she beat Cupid at his own game and get her parents to fall back in love?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its Kindness Day! Mr. Guzman announces that if all students complete one act of kindness, theyll get a class pizza party-and Hazel wants that pizza! But when Dev refuses to participate, Cosmo and Wanda call on the Pe-Az, a trio of alien diplomats, to reason with him. Despite their best efforts, Dev outsmarts the Pe-Az and uses their alien technology to get rid of all the pizza on Earth.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Its Christmas and tradition dictates that there should be 13 desserts on the table. But Chef has got his quantities wrong and hes only made 12! Chef and Blossom head into the forest to find the ingredients to make the missing dessert. They run into Gargamel who is picking the last walnuts of the season to prepare a meal for his family. He wants to impress his mother! Theres only one solution: to follow him. But Gargamels mother turns up with Dwayne and Rowena. The Smurfs offer to help Gargamel to finish his menu. They hope to create a diversion and steal his dessert. // Its Jokeys turn to look after Baby Smurf. Brainy accuses him of being a bad babysitter so Bubble offers to help him but then things get tricky: Baby Smurf is somehow turned into a snail! Brainy is threatening to tell Papa Smurf everything, so Jokey and Bubble need to find a way of turning Baby Smurf back into Baby Smurf. Quick! But more disasters lie ahead.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Clumsy and Dimwitty cause an accident when they argue once again about who is going to drive the fire truck. They dont want to be told off by Papa Smurf so they decide to get rid of it. But when a fire starts in the village, Papa Smurf orders them to go and get it. They do all they can to get it back but it wont be easy! They bump into the ogre and Begonia before heading to Gargamels. // Gargamel sets a new trap for the Smurfs by bewitching pebbles. The Smurfs are so enchanted by these shiny wonders that they argue endlessly about their incredible beauty. Luckily Voltaire is on the lookout and isnt hypnotized! He frees Lily from the magic spell and together they save their friends.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Bubble and Firefly are on the lookout for an amazing adventure, so they head to Gargamels hovel. Once there, they see that Dwayne and Rowena are spending the night at their uncles. Rowena is desperate for the tooth fairy to come and get her baby tooth thats hanging on by a thread! This gives Bubble an idea: theyre going to steal Rowenas tooth and take it back to the village to prove that theyre also adventurers. // When Gargamel finds a way of turning off all the lights thanks to a magic switch, the Smurfs are plunged into complete darkness. Only Firefly can help them to see in the dark ... but that attracts Gargamel to the village. He catches all of the Smurfs, except for Firefly, who will have to be very brave to free her friends. This gives her a great confidence boost!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Dev is bummed at his own birthday party because his dad is off working. Hazel tries to cheer him up by wishing for a pair of rocket boots for him. He is stoked! Then, a party princess arrives, but this is no ordinary party princess, its VICKY from the original series. Meanwhile, Cosmo, Wanda, and Peri stumble into a secret room, where they discover that Dale has been investigating Hazel since Founders Day. Back at the party, Vicky, rotten as ever, forces the kids to make crafts for her online store instead of having fun. Hazel comes up with a plan full of zany traps to stop Vicky and take the party back! When Dev discovers his dad has been researching Hazel instead of spending time with him, Dev lashes out at Hazel and wishes Peri away. Left alone with his anger, is there a devious plan hatching in Devs mind?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Having filled up another wish card, Hazel is enjoying a fun, fantasy wish. Meanwhile, Cookie, the fairy who got bested by Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda after their Wish Trials, is setting a trap for our trio. She tricks them into publicly talking about magic at a fake museum exhibit, records the evidence, and then takes them to Fairy Court. Now, Hazel must prove that Cosmo and Wanda are innocent, or else lose them forever. // Frustrated by her moms split attention between work and home, Hazel wishes to be her assistant to spend more time with her. Cosmo and Wanda turn Hazel into an adult, and she spends the day struggling to fulfill her duties. Even though being a working adult is hard, Hazel is excited to be spending so much quality time with Angela. But when the puppet standing in for Hazel at school gets called into the nurses office, Angela rushes off to take care of it and Hazel must give the presentation instead!

As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes to meet a dinosaur. Cosmo and Wanda bring Bary, a Baryonyx from the Cretaceous period, to present day. Hazel makes wishes to find Bary a job but unfortunately, Bary never quite fits in. Worse, his giant dinosaur tail knocks out power to the whole city, ruining Dimmadelphias prized Electric Light Ice Cream Float Parade. With Hazel feeling remorseful, Bary musters inspiration from his hero, the great Thomas Rex-ison, and uses his dinosaur smarts to try to save the day. // Hazel has planned a night of watching scary movies with her new friend, Jasmine, but it turns out Jasmine hates scary movies. Rather than change the plan, Hazel wishes Jasmine had no fears. When Cosmo and Wanda grant the wish, the fears escape Jasmines mind, coming into the real world. Hazel tries fighting the fears off but learns its Jasmine who must face them to make them disappear. Now, shes got to talk her new friend into doing everything shes most afraid of, which gets the attention of Fear Itself!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must pass Wish Trials in Fairy World to prove theyre a match. Hazel crumbles under pressure, struggling to make a wish confidently, which leads to Cosmo and Wanda failing to grant her half-formed wishes. Consequently, Jorgen reassigns Hazel to a boisterous, no-nonsense fairy named Cookie, who only cares about efficiency, not accuracy. Displeased with the cookie-cutter nature of Cookies magic, Hazel must find a way to confidently wish for Cosmo and Wanda to be her fairies again. // Intimidated by her new classmates, Hazel wishes to be friends with the teachers instead. Once her wish is granted, she and the teachers play around the schoolyard and neglect to prep for the big test coming up. When test day arrives, Hazel realizes her wish has decreased the teachers maturity. Theyre acting like little kids! Hazel has to make a choice-keep her teacher friends and let the whole school fail or change them back and brave making new friends the hard way.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Hazel wishes to be 13 so that she can go see a PG-13 movie by herself, Cosmo and Wanda turn her into a teenager. They go the mall and have a blast doing "teenage things" while they wait for the movie. But, as a side effect of her wish, Hazel starts going through the fairy version of puberty: pasta puberty! As she struggles to deal with pesto pimples and mozzarella mood swings, Hazel wishes that Cosmo and Wanda would just get lost! They disappear, leaving Hazel to deal with the zany pasta puberty alone. // Hazel wishes to be a fairy to join Cosmo and Wanda at their Fairy Convention, but since its against Da Rules, she settles on looking like a fairy instead. Once at the con, however, Hazel stumbles into the DMV booth and signs a "Fairy-fication" certificate, turning her into a real fairy! It also brings her anti-fairy into existence, who steals the certificate. Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must get the certificate back from her anti-fairy, or Hazel will be stuck as a fairy forever!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel must take matters into her own hands to get to the bottom of Devs surly attitude and save pizza! When Hazel makes a wish to understand why Dev acts the way he does, she gets paired with him for a class scavenger hunt. They struggle to work together, but, as the day goes on, they develop a friendship. However, that falls apart when Devs dad, Dale, belittles their effort, causing Dev to turn on Hazel again to save face. Will Dev be able to overcome his pride and finish the project, or will his issues with his dad tank both their grades?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Gargamel tries to teach Dwayne to catch the Smurfs. As an incentive, he offers him a deal: hell get him a new Snap if he catches a Smurf. Suddenly Dwayne is all in! He prepares a potion that will turn him into a super tracker. What he hadnt expected was the potion turning him into a hunting dog. After several unsuccessful but funny attempts, he finds his way to the Smurf village. Oh no! Who can get him off the trail? // Meteorite is tireless: shes always tapping the beat on whatever she has at hand. When shes drumming in the forest, she and Storm run into Gargamel. They manage to escape but she forgets her drum. Gargamel makes the most of this and bewitches it so that it comes to life. Its music hypnotizes the Smurfies and leads them straight to Gargamel. Meteorite uses his own weapon against him in an unexpected way!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Life is more fun when youre dancing! Thats what Meteorite is thinking whilst Brainy is trying to get everyone to work so that the village is clean when Papa Smurf returns. When Meteorite finds a night club in the forest, she brings it back to the village with help from Vanity. The discosmurf encounters a huge success - all of the Smurfs and Smurfies are dancing ... but beware, it might be one of Gargamels traps. // Everyone is preparing a dance party and Diaper Daddy is delighted to be going. But his battery is nearly empty so Handy puts him in standby mode to recharge him. When he wakes up, hes devastated to learn that hes missed the party! Annoyed, he heads off into the forest looking for a new family. The first person he bumps into is Dwayne, who adopts him as his new toy, with Rowena looking on with envy. Handy will do everything he can to get his friend back.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Lily and Chef are preparing a picnic when theyre attacked by Azrael. They throw the delicious muffins that theyd made for the party at him. But Azrael doesnt like cakes and this annoys Chef. So he decides to make the most delicious cat food for him. Azrael eats the cat food and it makes him as cuddly and cute as a kitten. This gives Gargamel an idea: hes going to give this magic cat food to his mother. She also becomes as gentle as a kitten ... but not for long! // Lily makes waffles that are so delicious that even Dwayne cant get enough of them! To escape from him, Lily and Greedy run away with the waffle truck, trying to lose him. He catches up with them and eats all of Greedys waffles. But thats still not enough, Dwayne wants even more waffles. What he doesnt know is that Voltaire has got his eye on him and knows how to defend Lily.

Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: When Max and Phoebe are due to attend Parent-Teacher night at school, Chloe asks to have her friends over to the house unsupervised. Despite being told no, she secretly invites Jinx and Booch over while her guardians are out. At school, Max convinces a reluctant Phoebe to lead an art demonstration for the parents, under the watchful eye of the schools vindictive superintendent. Meanwhile, Jinx discovers the Air Lair, and before Chloe can offer a good cover story, he assumes evil spies are secretly living at their home, and plan to target the parents at the school that night. Jinx races to the school to stop his imagined threat, disrupting Phoebes demonstration and putting the Thundermans cover jobs in jeopardy.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Transformers: Earthspark
programme.desc: Feeling helpless as Robbys condition worsens, Mo wishes she had never touched the Emberstone. Quintus Prime shows the young hero that because of her, the world is a better place.

programme.title: Best and Bester

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester have to find a smart way to make their flight despite not looking like their passport photos. // Best decides to let his sister win "Employee of the Month" for once, but finds that losing doesnt come naturally.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: When Rocky swallows the last piece of their jigsaw puzzle, Best and Bester head into the unknown to retrieve it. // Best and Bester go on a mission to return an overdue library book without being spotted by the scary librarian.

programme.title: Super Duper Bunny League
programme.desc: Stumpy tests the bunnies patience when he befriends a not-so-awesome new hero. // The bunnies go toe-to-toe with Dr. Fuzzleglove when he unleashes a stinky horde of cheese zombies upon Important City.

programme.title: Planet Sheen
programme.desc: Sheen accidentally launches into outer space and crashes on the planet Zeenu. The Emperor of Zeenu mistakes him for a genius and appoints him as Super High Royal Supreme Advisor, the jealous Dorkus vows to destroy him, and he befriends a space chimp.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: Canadian computer-animated television series Top Wing presents an exciting story of four courageous young birds, Swift, Penny, Brody, and Rod on Big Swirl Island. They are cadets at Top Wing Academy with the best of the best students and have access to the most advanced technology. By operating different vehicles like a submarine, a boat, a jet or a motorcycle, the cadets learn how to work as a team and are the first to rush to the rescue to those in trouble. Major lessons are learnt with the help of their mentor Speedy. With every new task performed the cadets become braver, stronger and smarter.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: As one of Aangs little detours, the group heads toward the island of Kyoshi. But soon they learn that the townspeople dont trust foreigners at all; however, when Aang proves to them that he is the Avatar they are treated as guests of honor. Katara wants to get some supplies and leave as soon as possible, while Aang is enjoying his time as a celebrity. Little do they know, though, that the Fire Nation has tracked them down. Also, Sokka meets and trains with a female warrior named Suki. Will Aang be able to save the village from the wrath of the Fire Nation?

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: "Time Out: Kowalskis invention that stops time falls into the worst hands possible. King Juliens. The lemur promptly breaks it trapping the two of them in a world frozen in time. Instead of being a disaster, however, they realize they can do everything their hearts desire invent like crazy, perform on Broadway, play tennis in the middle of the street. But even an infinite playland like this cant last forever! Our Man in Grrfurjiclestan: Special Agent Buck Rockgut makes a "triumphant" return. While hunting the Red Squirrel across the globe, the crusty old bird contacts the penguins with a warning that the diabolical squirrel has a brainwashed sleeper agent among them. They battle each other to a standstill to uncover the agent - will it tear the unit apart? Can trust ever be restored? They have to take a trip to a faraway borough to uncover the truth."

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: The rebels battle the Chaos Council to secure the "Crystal" that gives the Council supreme power. Sonic assumes this crystal is the Paradox Prism, but hes stunned by the truth about the Power Crystal... and the events that shattered the world.

programme.desc: Watching too many ninja movies has brainwashed Leonard the koala. During the day, as he sleeps, he terrorizes everyone by sleepfighting (as opposed to sleepwalking). The penguins counter-program Leonard with a Lunacorn love movie marathon - is it enough to conquer all? // Private is left to babysit four adorable ducklings as the rest of the gang tries to crash a monster truck rally (unsuccessfully). The ducklings are a rowdy bunch and throw a party, inadvertently attracting party-crashing rats and wasps who attack the party food. Private and the ducklings become trapped in the lair with the food, and as the rats and wasps try to break in, Private must think fast - how can he combat both gangs at once?

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The penguins notice its been quiet at night. Too quiet, somethings amiss. The rest of the zoo animals have been sneaking out at night to spend time partying in the park! The plan to sneak out then return by morning to avoid getting caught by Alice is put in jeopardy when they run into the classic New York problem - a traffic jam in the tunnel. How in the world can a traffic jam get cleared out of the tunnel in time? // The penguins make a new friend in Dode the dodo bird, who they clone back into existence after a pesky bout of extinction. Having grown up with no natural enemies, Dode has no fear and it leads him to daredevilish behavior - the kind that can make you extinct over and over again. The penguins dont want to see this keep happening to their friend, they need to find a way to slow this crazy bird down!

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks hinges on David Seville, a single father whose everyday struggle is to bring up his kids, 3 chipmunks: Alvin- the oldest brother, the leader, not so good at school, Simon- the smartest of the three brothers, exemplary pupil and Theodore- the youngest one, the chubby one, the gentle one. David "Dave" sometimes loses his temper and then he is shouting "Alvinnnnn!!!". Music is an obligatory pleasant part of every episode. Every episode touches up-to-date issues of both adults and kids from modern life like real problems at school, dating and so on. Thanks to their own foolishness chipmunks often find themselves in ridiculous situations and have to use their creativity to get out of a mess, that provides us with a good opportunity to enjoy their joyful adventures.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: King Me/Private and the Winky Factory King Me: King Juliens archrival, Clemson, returns in another attempt to claim the lemur crown. This time the sneaky lemur has a document that "proves" King Julien is not the legitimate king because he wasnt born in Madagascar. A series of challenges to prove whos more kingly ensues, and the penguins try to stack the deck in Juliens favor by each switching brains with him. Simple, right? How could a plan like this possibly fail? Private and the Winky Factory: Privates favorite treat, the Peanut Butter Winky, is going the way of the dinosaur. Distraught that the snack cake is ceasing production, Private urges a raid on the Winky Factory where the last remaining Winkies are rolling off the production line. Impressed by Privates passion, Skipper gives him command of the mission! The young penguin learns theres a heck of a lot to digest when leading a team. programme.title: Bubble Guppies
programme.desc: The series Bubble Guppies revolves around the underwater adventures of a group of mermaid-like preschoolers who life in the fictional underwater city of Bubbletucky. The episode starts with a sketch of Molly saying "Hi, its me Molly and its time for-" only to be stopped by Gil doing the subject of the show. When Gil or Molly says "Its time for Bubble Guppies!", the theme song starts. After the theme song, the Little Fish say the episodes name. Something happens when a character goes to school. After that, the school day begins and the Bubble Guppies say "Good morning, Mr. Grouper!". Later, the remaining Guppie tells Mr. Grouper about what happened earlier. He states "Lets think about it," and the characters discuss the topic. The pop song for the episode then begins.One of the Guppies will go to a shop that mostly focuses on the topic. The owner of the shop will asks questions about what he or she needs. Later, Mr. Grouper comes into the shop and says its time for lunch, and the "Lunchtime" song plays. At lunch the characters make a food joke about the subject of the episode. After lunch, another Gil and Molly sketch is shown. The Guppies do something fun which leads Mr. Grouper talking more about the topic, which leads into a dancing song. Mr. Grouper then says its time to go outside, the "Outside" song plays, and the Guppies make up a story about the topic. After this, Gil and Molly do another sketch.The Guppies go on a field trip that focuses on the topic, and the show concludes with the last Gil and Molly sketch and a shorter version of the theme song.

programme.desc: Two ducks with thin legs and round faces, SwaySway and Buhdeuce, are best friends. They fly around the water-based planet Pondgea in a rocket-powered van and deliver fresh bread to its citizens. They find new friends, deal with opponents and have fun, making sure Pondgea always receive fresh bread on time.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The zoosters think King Julien has caused sweet old lady Gladys to slip and hurt herself, thus cutting off the special treats she brings for them. The rush to judgment condemns the protesting lemur to a mighty swat from the Rump Whomper. As the clock winds down to his unspeakable punishment only one abstains - Skippers gut inexplicably insists that King Julien is innocent. You should know better than to go against your gut. // Kowalskis dream of attending the giant invention expo INVEXPO have to be put on hold when hes laid up with broken legs. programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Littlefoot: Marlene is dying to go see a concert in the park. But, every time she leaves the zoo she becomes a feral monster! Kowalski comes to the rescue with his invention the Persona-Disentangleizer, which separates her savage nature from her regular self. The savage Marlene escapes and rampages through the city. Can the Penguins stop her before she destroys the city? Smotherly Love: Ma, an empty-nested mother possum, takes up residence in the Penguins Lair after they destroy her home during a battle with Hans the Puffin. She smothers the penguins with love and nurturing, and gets her new boys to behave by playing possum whenever necessary. The battle-hardened unit devolves into a bunch of softies, opening the door for Hans to take advantage. It looks like he has the upper wing, unless someone can make a play to stop him!

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: A Kipper for Skipper: Its off to the races when Skipper agrees to give a day off from hard training to the first penguin who can bring him a kipper. Private, Rico, and Kowalski battle their way to a fish packing plant where they discover Officer X has become Fishmonger X. The deranged X sniffs out the fighting penguins, capturing them and hauling them off to the pokey. Can they rediscover the teamwork they had forsaken in order to escape? High Moltage: The penguins are determined to make opening day of their favorite action stars blockbuster movie! Private, however, has an itchy problem - hes turned hideous because hes molting! The penguins need his hypercute powers to knock Alice out and disengage her new zoo security system. The despondent bird does all he can to reconstruct his cuteness, but sadly his hypercute powers distort to cause a hyperalarming, hypervomitous mess!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Sonic learns that Nine is using the New Yoke shard to create his dream world in a barren shatterspace called The Grim. Can Sonic convince Nine to fight with him by the Rebels side against the Chaos Council back in New Yoke, before its too late?

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Sonic lands in the deep seas of The No Place, where pirate versions of his friends are led by Knuckled the Dredd. When Sonics hunt for the No Place Shard runs afoul of the Dredds haunted past, the crew names a new captain... Sonic!

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks hinges on David Seville, a single father whose everyday struggle is to bring up his kids, 3 chipmunks: Alvin- the oldest brother, the leader, not so good at school, Simon- the smartest of the three brothers, exemplary pupil and Theodore- the youngest one, the chubby one, the gentle one. David "Dave" sometimes loses his temper and then he is shouting "Alvinnnnn!!!". Music is an obligatory pleasant part of every episode. Every episode touches up-to-date issues of both adults and kids from modern life like real problems at school, dating and so on. Thanks to their own foolishness chipmunks often find themselves in ridiculous situations and have to use their creativity to get out of a mess, that provides us with a good opportunity to enjoy their joyful adventures.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Best Foes: Kowalski invents an enemy detector. As is often the case, it doesnt work, and Skipper gets his own wires crossed when he smashes it. Old enemies are now friends and old friends are now enemies as the boss bird starts to systematically clean out the zoo with the help of his new friend Hans. King Julien gets into the act by becoming Skippers friend too, going so far as to Congaga dance together. New BFF Hans is not happy with the new bromance, however. Could this be the opening the penguins need? Night of the Vesuviuses: The annual Zoo Snooze is here! Kids get to buy tickets for a zoo sleepover, a treat the animals look forward to every year! This years going to be very different, however, when the rotten Vesuvius Twins buy up all the tickets themselves. The zoosters plan to turn the tables, though, and exact sweet revenge on the twins. The penguins, influenced by Private of course, cant let this happen, and its a long nights journey into day as the penguins scramble to protect their one-time tormentors.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Bettervale is celebrating "Better Day" but Best and Bester manage to anger the townsfolk by causing mischief again. // After a period of exile Best and Bester return hoping to patch things up with their neighbours and with each other.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: The twins take a cactus called Pricklebutt to the beach and end up mounting a dramatic search and rescue mission. // Best and Bester wont let Grumpy Pants round of golf stop them from catching the finale of their favourite show.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Its Best to the rescue when Besters phobia of camels threatens to de-rail her chances of being dance champ. // Best and Bester go busking, but will Best cope with competition and what happens when burgers and banjos collide?

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best ruins Besters painting by accident so in order to avoid hurting her feelings he blames an innocent chicken. // Having lost their soccer ball over the garden fence, the twins have no option but to find a way to get it back.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Besters record attempt is at risk when Best steals her thunder by being the robot instead of learning the robot. // On a search for the first woodpecker in spring, Best finds that hes in very much in tune with nature after all.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Not your average bunch of teenagers, the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles have been expertly trained by their anthropomorphic rat sensei, Splinter, in the art of ninjutsu. Criminals of New York beware, beneath the streets of this concrete metropolis, Leonardo, Michelangelo, Donatello and Raphael are waiting to put their training into practice, battling evil forces within the city and restoring peace. From petty thieves, to evil overlords, to aliens of an unfamiliar kind, New York is safe in the hands of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles!

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig
programme.desc: This animated comedy show follows the outrageous and often gross-out antics of a enthusiastic and curious 12-year-old boy named Sanjay Patel and his best friend and a master of disguise, a talking snake named Craig. These two are match made in heaven as they find themselves in crazy and hilarious situations every day in their home town of Lundgren. They complete each other and together they are ready to face any challenges and difficulties that life has ahead for them.

programme.title: Папа попал
programme.desc: Вас приветствует самое весёлое семейное телешоу "Папа попал". По правилам проекта участником шоу может стать абсолютно любой мужчина, у которого есть уставшая от жизни и бытовых проблем жена, а также минимум двое детей. В то время, как супруга уезжает отдыхать на далёкий и красивый курорт, ее муж начинает принимать на себя все обязанности своей благоверной. На протяжении 7 дней папа должен будет выполнять абсолютно все задания и поручения, которые обычно выполняет его жена. Уборка, стирка, поход за покупками, воспитание детей и поддержание уюта в доме - всё это теперь ляжет на сильные плечи украинских пап. Более того, участники шоу должны будут сделать еще и множество чисто мужских работ, которые долгие годы их просили выполнить их супруги. Починить забор, поклеить обои, отремонтировать автомобиль или научить ребёнка танцевать - всё это также ляжет на плечи наших мужчин-участников. Папа может? Посмотрим!

programme.title: Папа попал

programme.title: СуперЖена
programme.desc: Беспрецедентный баттл за титул суперженщины начинается! Каждую неделю 4 обаятельные и привлекательные девушки будут выяснять, кто же из них достоин звания лучшей жены. С понедельника по четверг дамы будут приходить друг к другу в гости, чтобы оценить хозяйственность, саморазвитие и сексуальность конкуренток. Сжульничать и выставить желаемое за действительное им не удастся, ведь за ними будет наблюдать опытный психолог. В пятницу он проведет беседы тет-а-тет и соберет девушек вместе, чтобы расставить все точки над "i".Хитрые манипуляторши, ведические жены, роковые соблазнительницы, яжматери и боевые подруги… Каждая женщина убеждена, что именно ее модель поведения самая правильная. Но кто же из них может покорить не только сердце своего мужчины, но и впечатлить конкуренток?

Починить забор, поклеить обои, отремонтировать автомобиль или научить ребёнка танцевать - всё это также ляжет на плечи наших мужчин-участников. Папа может? Посмотрим!

programme.title: Spried ar Delfi
programme.desc: Katru darba dienu kopā ar dažādu nozaru speciālistiem, kā arī "Delfi" un citu mediju žurnālistiem aicinām skatītājus spriest par kādu aktuālu tematu - politiķu lēmumiem un to sekām, amatpersonu rīcību un tās motīviem, pārmaiņām sabiedrībā un tās virzītām iniciatīvām, pasaulē notiekošo un tā ietekmi uz Latviju, sasniegumiem un zaudējumiem sportā, kultūras personībām un procesiem.

programme.title: Latvijas stāsti
programme.desc: Jānis un Antra Lingas-Bērziņi jau trešo gadu saimnieko Cēsu novada Raiskuma pagasta "Cepurītēs". Antra ir veterinārārste, Jāņa izglītība saistīta ar informācijas tehnoloģiju jomu, taču nu jau kādu laiku viņš ir zirgu kalējs jeb precīzāk - zirgu nagu kopšanas speciālists. Šo amatu apguvis Šveicē, mācoties no pieredzējušiem kalējiem, un nu jau Jānis strādā staļļos ne tikai Latvijā, bet arī Lietuvā.

programme.title: Latvijas stāsti
programme.desc: Jānis Pūcītis ir viens no retajiem salmu jumtu meistariem ne vien Latvijā, bet arī Eiropā. Par pieprasījumu meistars nesūdzas, tiesa gan, tas nav Latvijā, jo pamatā darbs ir Zviedrijā, kur arī apgūtas amata prasmes. Meistars ne tikai liek jumtus, bet pats arī vāc salmus un tos apstrādā. Šim nolūkam gan der tikai bioloģiski audzēti, Latvijas senās "Kaupo" šķirnes rudzi, jo to stiebri ir stipri un dod jumtam ilgu gadu garantiju. Jānis Pūcītis ir arī biedrs starptautiskajā jumtu licēju asociācijā, stāsta, ka šobrīd arvien vairāk valstīs domā par ekoloģiju un populārāki kļūst arī šie jumti.

programme.title: Latvijas stāsti
programme.desc: Madonas novads ir viens no viskuplāk pārstāvētajiem novadiem Dziesmu svētkos. Savukārt Madonas kori skatēs iegūst vienus no visaugstākajiem rezultātiem. Kāds ir madoniešu Dziesmu svētku stāsts un kā to palīdz nosargāt Haralda Medņa Dziesmusvētku skola?

programme.title: Latvijas stāsti
programme.desc: Sabilniece Ina Valtere ir Latvijas Amatniecības kameras diplomēta meistare. Viņa vienmēr savos rokdarbos ir popularizējusi arī Talsu novadu un Sabili. Viņa perfekti pieprot ļoti daudzas rokdarbu tehnikas, taču vismīļākā ir cimdu adīšana, un arī viņas meistardarbnīca Kurzemes Šveicē nosaukta par "Cimdiņiem".

programme.title: Latvijas stāsti
programme.desc: Tautas mūzikas instrumentu meistars un restaurators, kapelas "Ziemeļmala" vadītājs Valters Reiznieks šoruden saņēma augstu sava darba novērtējumu - Latvijas Nacionālā kultūras centra tradicionālās kultūras izcilības balvu tautas mūzikas nozarē. Nu jau ilgus gadus Valters Reiznieks dzīvo Limbažos, bet viņa dzimtā puse ir Tirza. Un tieši ģimenē rodamas saknes meistara mīlestībai pret tautas mūziku, tur viņš iepazinis senos mūzikas instrumentus, ko nu apguvis pats un māca spēlēt citiem.

programme.title: Spried ar Delfi
programme.desc: Katru darba dienu kopā ar dažādu nozaru speciālistiem, kā arī "Delfi" un citu mediju žurnālistiem aicinām skatītājus spriest par kādu aktuālu tematu - politiķu lēmumiem un to sekām, amatpersonu rīcību un tās motīviem, pārmaiņām sabiedrībā un tās virzītām iniciatīvām, pasaulē notiekošo un tā ietekmi uz Latviju, sasniegumiem un zaudējumiem sportā, kultūras personībām un procesiem.
